items.Name: Sword of Noob
items.Description: This sword is dingy and quite awful. It is mostly fit for the inexperienced

items.Name: Santa's Hat
items.Description: This piece of armor doesn't have much protection, but it does give you the urge to give gifts.

items.Name: 10 Gallon Hat
items.Description: It appears this hat can fit at 10 jugs of milk within it

items.Name: Frostmourne
items.Description: The Lich King's sword speaks to you as if from within.

items.Name: Red Plate Chestpiece
items.Description: It gleams red as if from the back of a Derethi Gyorn

items.Name: Bag of Dicks
items.Description: It's quite literally what it advertised. Quite revolting.

items.Name: High Heels
items.Description: You feel much more fabulous while wearing these.

items.Name: Hulk Fists
items.Description: These glowing green gauntlets appear slightly irradiated.
